content.content: Diving into quant trading and blockchain full-time. Left NYU to chase this dream. Learning, networking, and exploring $$XVI's potential. Big move, big feels.
content.raw_content: 🧑‍💻 Exciting New Chapter Alert! I've taken a leave from NYU to dive headfirst into the world of quant trading & blockchain at my new gig. 🌐💰 Learning, networking, and exploring $XVI's potential. #CareerShift #QuantTrading #BlockchainTech #XVI
